comments.body:
These hashcode and equals methods are pretty risky. They depend on mutable fields, which will result in objects disappearing from any Set or Hash they're placed in if any of the mutable fields change.

I'm assuming they either aren't ever added to such collections, or that they never get mutated after they are.

I leave it to you to decide how concerning this possibility is.
The fields are semantically immutable. If we want to enforce it in the code, we would need to rewrite it somewhat. Not sure if it's worth it as it might make the code more convoluted.
